commentary: Another instance of a psychic putting things to sleep. It keeps happening. The ramp up to his cocoon is a nice feature. Not exactly sure how that got installed. My guess? At some point, when Tavros was figuring out how to adjust to his new lifestyle, Vriska came over to sort of patch things up with him, and in a gesture of goodwill, built it for him. You know, after the accident. He's very lucky to have a friend like her.
